author: Aila Slisco
title: Republican Senator Says A Nationwide Coronavirus Shelter-in-Place Order 'Seems Like An Overreaction'
description: Sen. John Cornyn (R-Texas) said that national orders to contain the highly contagious virus would not be needed because "some places have more cows than people."
content:
Sen. John Cornyn (R-Texas) deemed a potential national shelter-in-place order amid the COVID-19 pandemic an "overreaction" on Thursday.
An increasing number of public health experts have recommended residents be ordered to stay home in an effort to help cont… [+2571 chars]
